issue.title: [C++] Extend type support for if_else kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13358](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13358). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If_else kernel requires following additional type support 
 \* Decimal type (trivial as there's fixed sized binary support already)
 \* Dict type
 \* Union Type
 \* Timestamp with time zone
 \* Lists
 \* Structs
